title: Size of LoL patches
body: Hey.Since i started using net stick i dont have infinite memory just 10g.So i was wondering how much Mbs does patch 6.8,6.9,6.10 take? Ty in advance

replies.body:
Patches are usually about 200-300 MB.  On average though, they are usually ~250 MB.  

For some context, the latest patch (6.10) was 247MB.

Hope this helps!  Let me know if you have any other questions!
